answers.answer: This is my first and I'm not in the range for it but I'm getting close and my pressure seems to say in the 140s. I'm scared it's going to turn into it. I'm taking meds to help so I hope that helps keep it down just another week so baby will be 37 weeks.

I had it in my first pregnancy and had to end up delivering at 35 weeks. I'm currently 27 weeks with my second and so far my blood pressure has been good so far but my Dr said he will monitor it when I get into my 30 weeks. I did however just found out I have GD with this pregnancy so I'm hoping I don't get preeclampsia on top of that! I wish you the best of luck it's a scary deal but I would just suggest you definitely rest as much as possible and don't over do it! Good luck!

Thanks, i am definitely  scared and trying not to do much of anything. But thats hard with a 2yo n a 4yo. My Bp for last few appointments had been 145/89. They rechecked after sitting for a while n it went down. We just couldnt get it yesterday.  My headaces have gotten severely worse. :/ ill find out soon about 7hrs what we will do.

question: Im 35 weeks wi th my 3rd.. today i found out i have preeclampsia. Will know more in depth tomorrow..  im now stressing.  Anyone going through this?
title: preeclampsia in 3rd pregnancy
